p: On March 2019, fresh green leaves of B. pilosa were collected from Bhatiari, Chittagong, Bangladesh (GPS coordinates: 22°28′4.7604′′ N and 91°43′38.7300′′ E). The plant was identified by Sheikh Bokhtear Uddin, Department of Botany, University of Chittagong, Chittagong-4331, Bangladesh (accession number: 36186).
